parameters.label: Seconds from now
parameters.description: The number of seconds from the call that the service will start.

parameters.label: Seconds from now
parameters.description: The number of seconds from the call that the service will start.

commands.label: Stop Service.
commands.description: Stop the service but does not shutdown.

parameters.label: Seconds from now
parameters.description: The number of seconds from the call that the service will stop.

commands.label: Restart Service.
commands.description: Stops and restarts the service but does not shutdown.

parameters.label: Seconds from now
parameters.description: The number of seconds from the call that the service will be restarted.

parameters.label: Seconds from now
parameters.description: The number of seconds from the call that the service will shutdown.
